question:
In which among the following countries is large part of the Taiga Biome found?
  1. Russia
  2. Australia
  3. Canada
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Taiga is the largest land biome and it makes up of about 29% of the world’s forest cover. Taiga is found in the northern parts of North America, Europe and Asia. A large part of this biome is located in Russia and Canada.
